Package miPhysics

Class Link

  • java.lang.Object
    • miPhysics.Link
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Attractor3D, Bubble3D, Contact3D, Damper3D, PlaneContact, Rope3D, Spring3D, SpringDamper1D, SpringDamper3D
    public abstract class Link
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract Link class. Defines generic structure and behavior for all possible Links.
    Author:
    James Leonard / james.leonard@gipsa-lab.fr
